StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegePro.leLoca.onsBySchoolRowGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode as uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear as int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT [CollegePro.leID], cp.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, cp.FiscalYear, hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName, [LocDisplayTablePrimary] ,[LocDisplayTableSecondary],[LocTes.ngRoom], [LocInterviewRoom],[LocTakeOne],[CampusWebSites],[PosteringRestric.ons] FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp INNER JOIN [dbo].High_School hs ON cp.school_code = hs.school_code WHERE hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear ORDER BY cp.[SCHOOL_CODE]
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
